[Kikuyu]: O na kũrĩ o ũguo, Andũ a Belgium na Swiss arĩa maaragia Kĩ-Faranja no makorwo maathomeire cukuru kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩhũthĩkaga mũno, na kwoguo no mahote gũgũtaũkwo o na korwo wahũthĩra mũtarĩre wa namba ũrĩa ũhũthĩkaga harĩ kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩaragio mũno.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kikuyu]: Magana-inĩ ma mĩaka ĩrĩa mĩhĩtũku, andũ manaaka mĩkaro na ũmenyereri kũrĩa kũrĩ na mathukuthuku, kũrĩa kũinamu o nginya igũrũ wa ihurũrũka iria ing’etheire iria.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kikuyu]: Mũigana wa mairũ 800 cia mĨberethi ya Trans-Alaska Pipeline nĨyahingirwo kũrũmĨrĨra gũitĨka kwa makiri ma barrels cia maguta mũhuro wa Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kikuyu]: Icigo imwe cia Belgium ciakoragwo irĩ icigo cia Luxembourg hĩndi ya tene no igĩtuika cia Belgium thuutha wa Belgian Revolution.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kikuyu]: Kuma yambĩrĩrio, The Onion nĩ ĩtuĩkĩte athamaki ama a mohoro ma kinyũrũri ma gukenia andũ, na ĩngĩ ya gũcabithio, na rũrenda  rũngĩ rũgucĩrĩirie aceri million ithano mweri wa ikũmi, na imenyithia cia biacara, na mohoro mũthenya wothe, na nĩ merĩgĩte kũrutithia  ibuku rĩa monereria rĩtago Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Kikuyu]: O na kũrĩ o ũguo, Andũ a Belgium na Swiss arĩa maaragia Kĩ-Faranja no makorwo maathomeire cukuru kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩhũthĩkaga mũno, na kwoguo no mahote gũgũtaũkwo o na korwo wahũthĩra mũtarĩre wa namba ũrĩa ũhũthĩkaga harĩ kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩaragio mũno.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kikuyu]: Magana-inĩ ma mĩaka ĩrĩa mĩhĩtũku, andũ manaaka mĩkaro na ũmenyereri kũrĩa kũrĩ na mathukuthuku, kũrĩa kũinamu o nginya igũrũ wa ihurũrũka iria ing’etheire iria.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kikuyu]: Mũigana wa mairũ 800 cia mĨberethi ya Trans-Alaska Pipeline nĨyahingirwo kũrũmĨrĨra gũitĨka kwa makiri ma barrels cia maguta mũhuro wa Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kikuyu]: Icigo imwe cia Belgium ciakoragwo irĩ icigo cia Luxembourg hĩndi ya tene no igĩtuika cia Belgium thuutha wa Belgian Revolution.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kikuyu]: Kuma yambĩrĩrio, The Onion nĩ ĩtuĩkĩte athamaki ama a mohoro ma kinyũrũri ma gukenia andũ, na ĩngĩ ya gũcabithio, na rũrenda  rũngĩ rũgucĩrĩirie aceri million ithano mweri wa ikũmi, na imenyithia cia biacara, na mohoro mũthenya wothe, na nĩ merĩgĩte kũrutithia  ibuku rĩa monereria rĩtago Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Kikuyu]: O na kũrĩ o ũguo, Andũ a Belgium na Swiss arĩa maaragia Kĩ-Faranja no makorwo maathomeire cukuru kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩhũthĩkaga mũno, na kwoguo no mahote gũgũtaũkwo o na korwo wahũthĩra mũtarĩre wa namba ũrĩa ũhũthĩkaga harĩ kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩaragio mũno.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kikuyu]: Magana-inĩ ma mĩaka ĩrĩa mĩhĩtũku, andũ manaaka mĩkaro na ũmenyereri kũrĩa kũrĩ na mathukuthuku, kũrĩa kũinamu o nginya igũrũ wa ihurũrũka iria ing’etheire iria.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kikuyu]: Mũigana wa mairũ 800 cia mĨberethi ya Trans-Alaska Pipeline nĨyahingirwo kũrũmĨrĨra gũitĨka kwa makiri ma barrels cia maguta mũhuro wa Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kikuyu]: Icigo imwe cia Belgium ciakoragwo irĩ icigo cia Luxembourg hĩndi ya tene no igĩtuika cia Belgium thuutha wa Belgian Revolution.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kikuyu]: Kuma yambĩrĩrio, The Onion nĩ ĩtuĩkĩte athamaki ama a mohoro ma kinyũrũri ma gukenia andũ, na ĩngĩ ya gũcabithio, na rũrenda  rũngĩ rũgucĩrĩirie aceri million ithano mweri wa ikũmi, na imenyithia cia biacara, na mohoro mũthenya wothe, na nĩ merĩgĩte kũrutithia  ibuku rĩa monereria rĩtago Our Dumb World.

[Kikuyu]: O na kũrĩ o ũguo, Andũ a Belgium na Swiss arĩa maaragia Kĩ-Faranja no makorwo maathomeire cukuru kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩhũthĩkaga mũno, na kwoguo no mahote gũgũtaũkwo o na korwo wahũthĩra mũtarĩre wa namba ũrĩa ũhũthĩkaga harĩ kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩaragio mũno.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kikuyu]: Magana-inĩ ma mĩaka ĩrĩa mĩhĩtũku, andũ manaaka mĩkaro na ũmenyereri kũrĩa kũrĩ na mathukuthuku, kũrĩa kũinamu o nginya igũrũ wa ihurũrũka iria ing’etheire iria.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kikuyu]: Mũigana wa mairũ 800 cia mĨberethi ya Trans-Alaska Pipeline nĨyahingirwo kũrũmĨrĨra gũitĨka kwa makiri ma barrels cia maguta mũhuro wa Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kikuyu]: Icigo imwe cia Belgium ciakoragwo irĩ icigo cia Luxembourg hĩndi ya tene no igĩtuika cia Belgium thuutha wa Belgian Revolution.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kikuyu]: Kuma yambĩrĩrio, The Onion nĩ ĩtuĩkĩte athamaki ama a mohoro ma kinyũrũri ma gukenia andũ, na ĩngĩ ya gũcabithio, na rũrenda  rũngĩ rũgucĩrĩirie aceri million ithano mweri wa ikũmi, na imenyithia cia biacara, na mohoro mũthenya wothe, na nĩ merĩgĩte kũrutithia  ibuku rĩa monereria rĩtago Our Dumb World.

src_text: Athuthuria kuuma cukuru mũnene wa Princeton kũũrĩa United States na cukuru mũnene wa Uppsala University kũũrĩa Sweden makĩruta riboti atĩ mĩthemba mĩerũ ĩcenjetie harĩ njiarwa igĩrĩ,ona akorwo mũtaratara ũyũ wetĩkĩtio nĩ ũtũmĩrĩte kahinda karaihu gũkĩra ũguo, nĩ ũndũ wa ũciarithania gatagatĩ ka iria kaingĩ cionekaga kũndũ kũmwe ta Darwin Finch, Geospiza fortes, na immigrant cactus finch, geospiza conirostris.
ref_text: Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src_text: Hĩndĩ ya haaro cia mogarũrũku cia Revolutionary War, icigĩrĩra cia mbere ikũmi na ithatũ nĩ ciathodekire thirikari ya gatagatĩ itaarĩ na hinya- ciĩna Congress ĩrĩ yo rũhonge rwa mũmwe- rungu rwa watho wa Article of Confederation.

hyp_text: Before the end of the Revolutionary War, the first ten amendments, which were ratified simultaneously and are known as the Bill of Rights, were added to the Constitution in 1791, replacing the Article of Confederation.

<|begin_of_text|><|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>

[Kikuyu]: O na kũrĩ o ũguo, Andũ a Belgium na Swiss arĩa maaragia Kĩ-Faranja no makorwo maathomeire cukuru kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩhũthĩkaga mũno, na kwoguo no mahote gũgũtaũkwo o na korwo wahũthĩra mũtarĩre wa namba ũrĩa ũhũthĩkaga harĩ kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩaragio mũno.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kikuyu]: Magana-inĩ ma mĩaka ĩrĩa mĩhĩtũku, andũ manaaka mĩkaro na ũmenyereri kũrĩa kũrĩ na mathukuthuku, kũrĩa kũinamu o nginya igũrũ wa ihurũrũka iria ing’etheire iria.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kikuyu]: Mũigana wa mairũ 800 cia mĨberethi ya Trans-Alaska Pipeline nĨyahingirwo kũrũmĨrĨra gũitĨka kwa makiri ma barrels cia maguta mũhuro wa Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kikuyu]: Icigo imwe cia Belgium ciakoragwo irĩ icigo cia Luxembourg hĩndi ya tene no igĩtuika cia Belgium thuutha wa Belgian Revolution.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kikuyu]: Kuma yambĩrĩrio, The Onion nĩ ĩtuĩkĩte athamaki ama a mohoro ma kinyũrũri ma gukenia andũ, na ĩngĩ ya gũcabithio, na rũrenda  rũngĩ rũgucĩrĩirie aceri million ithano mweri wa ikũmi, na imenyithia cia biacara, na mohoro mũthenya wothe, na nĩ merĩgĩte kũrutithia  ibuku rĩa monereria rĩtago Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

src_text: Congress nĩ yagaga mahinya ma gũtuĩra magoti, na nĩũndũ gũtiarĩ na honge cia wathani cia executive kana judiciary, yehokaga thirikari cia matũra, ĩrĩa kaingĩ ĩtanyitanagĩra nayo, nĩ getha gũtigĩrĩra ũrũmĩrĩri wa mawatho.
ref_text: Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on state authorities, who were often uncooperative, to enforce all its acts.
hyp_text: Congress has the power to make laws, and because it has the authority to oversee the actions of the executive and judiciary branches, it plays a critical role in shaping the country's laws, which it has the duty to protect.

hyp_text: The internet has connected people from different cultures and backgrounds around the world.
prompt:
<|begin_of_text|><|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>

You are an accurate translator. You MUST answer with the following JSON scheme: {"translation": string}<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

[Kikuyu]: O na kũrĩ o ũguo, Andũ a Belgium na Swiss arĩa maaragia Kĩ-Faranja no makorwo maathomeire cukuru kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩhũthĩkaga mũno, na kwoguo no mahote gũgũtaũkwo o na korwo wahũthĩra mũtarĩre wa namba ũrĩa ũhũthĩkaga harĩ kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩaragio mũno.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kikuyu]: Magana-inĩ ma mĩaka ĩrĩa mĩhĩtũku, andũ manaaka mĩkaro na ũmenyereri kũrĩa kũrĩ na mathukuthuku, kũrĩa kũinamu o nginya igũrũ wa ihurũrũka iria ing’etheire iria.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kikuyu]: Mũigana wa mairũ 800 cia mĨberethi ya Trans-Alaska Pipeline nĨyahingirwo kũrũmĨrĨra gũitĨka kwa makiri ma barrels cia maguta mũhuro wa Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kikuyu]: Icigo imwe cia Belgium ciakoragwo irĩ icigo cia Luxembourg hĩndi ya tene no igĩtuika cia Belgium thuutha wa Belgian Revolution.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kikuyu]: Kuma yambĩrĩrio, The Onion nĩ ĩtuĩkĩte athamaki ama a mohoro ma kinyũrũri ma gukenia andũ, na ĩngĩ ya gũcabithio, na rũrenda  rũngĩ rũgucĩrĩirie aceri million ithano mweri wa ikũmi, na imenyithia cia biacara, na mohoro mũthenya wothe, na nĩ merĩgĩte kũrutithia  ibuku rĩa monereria rĩtago Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Kikuyu]: O na kũrĩ o ũguo, Andũ a Belgium na Swiss arĩa maaragia Kĩ-Faranja no makorwo maathomeire cukuru kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩhũthĩkaga mũno, na kwoguo no mahote gũgũtaũkwo o na korwo wahũthĩra mũtarĩre wa namba ũrĩa ũhũthĩkaga harĩ kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩaragio mũno.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kikuyu]: Magana-inĩ ma mĩaka ĩrĩa mĩhĩtũku, andũ manaaka mĩkaro na ũmenyereri kũrĩa kũrĩ na mathukuthuku, kũrĩa kũinamu o nginya igũrũ wa ihurũrũka iria ing’etheire iria.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kikuyu]: Mũigana wa mairũ 800 cia mĨberethi ya Trans-Alaska Pipeline nĨyahingirwo kũrũmĨrĨra gũitĨka kwa makiri ma barrels cia maguta mũhuro wa Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kikuyu]: Icigo imwe cia Belgium ciakoragwo irĩ icigo cia Luxembourg hĩndi ya tene no igĩtuika cia Belgium thuutha wa Belgian Revolution.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kikuyu]: Kuma yambĩrĩrio, The Onion nĩ ĩtuĩkĩte athamaki ama a mohoro ma kinyũrũri ma gukenia andũ, na ĩngĩ ya gũcabithio, na rũrenda  rũngĩ rũgucĩrĩirie aceri million ithano mweri wa ikũmi, na imenyithia cia biacara, na mohoro mũthenya wothe, na nĩ merĩgĩte kũrutithia  ibuku rĩa monereria rĩtago Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Kikuyu]: O na kũrĩ o ũguo, Andũ a Belgium na Swiss arĩa maaragia Kĩ-Faranja no makorwo maathomeire cukuru kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩhũthĩkaga mũno, na kwoguo no mahote gũgũtaũkwo o na korwo wahũthĩra mũtarĩre wa namba ũrĩa ũhũthĩkaga harĩ kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩaragio mũno.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kikuyu]: Magana-inĩ ma mĩaka ĩrĩa mĩhĩtũku, andũ manaaka mĩkaro na ũmenyereri kũrĩa kũrĩ na mathukuthuku, kũrĩa kũinamu o nginya igũrũ wa ihurũrũka iria ing’etheire iria.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kikuyu]: Mũigana wa mairũ 800 cia mĨberethi ya Trans-Alaska Pipeline nĨyahingirwo kũrũmĨrĨra gũitĨka kwa makiri ma barrels cia maguta mũhuro wa Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kikuyu]: Icigo imwe cia Belgium ciakoragwo irĩ icigo cia Luxembourg hĩndi ya tene no igĩtuika cia Belgium thuutha wa Belgian Revolution.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kikuyu]: Kuma yambĩrĩrio, The Onion nĩ ĩtuĩkĩte athamaki ama a mohoro ma kinyũrũri ma gukenia andũ, na ĩngĩ ya gũcabithio, na rũrenda  rũngĩ rũgucĩrĩirie aceri million ithano mweri wa ikũmi, na imenyithia cia biacara, na mohoro mũthenya wothe, na nĩ merĩgĩte kũrutithia  ibuku rĩa monereria rĩtago Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Kikuyu]: O na kũrĩ o ũguo, Andũ a Belgium na Swiss arĩa maaragia Kĩ-Faranja no makorwo maathomeire cukuru kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩhũthĩkaga mũno, na kwoguo no mahote gũgũtaũkwo o na korwo wahũthĩra mũtarĩre wa namba ũrĩa ũhũthĩkaga harĩ kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩaragio mũno.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kikuyu]: Magana-inĩ ma mĩaka ĩrĩa mĩhĩtũku, andũ manaaka mĩkaro na ũmenyereri kũrĩa kũrĩ na mathukuthuku, kũrĩa kũinamu o nginya igũrũ wa ihurũrũka iria ing’etheire iria.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kikuyu]: Mũigana wa mairũ 800 cia mĨberethi ya Trans-Alaska Pipeline nĨyahingirwo kũrũmĨrĨra gũitĨka kwa makiri ma barrels cia maguta mũhuro wa Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kikuyu]: Icigo imwe cia Belgium ciakoragwo irĩ icigo cia Luxembourg hĩndi ya tene no igĩtuika cia Belgium thuutha wa Belgian Revolution.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kikuyu]: Kuma yambĩrĩrio, The Onion nĩ ĩtuĩkĩte athamaki ama a mohoro ma kinyũrũri ma gukenia andũ, na ĩngĩ ya gũcabithio, na rũrenda  rũngĩ rũgucĩrĩirie aceri million ithano mweri wa ikũmi, na imenyithia cia biacara, na mohoro mũthenya wothe, na nĩ merĩgĩte kũrutithia  ibuku rĩa monereria rĩtago Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Kikuyu]: O na kũrĩ o ũguo, Andũ a Belgium na Swiss arĩa maaragia Kĩ-Faranja no makorwo maathomeire cukuru kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩhũthĩkaga mũno, na kwoguo no mahote gũgũtaũkwo o na korwo wahũthĩra mũtarĩre wa namba ũrĩa ũhũthĩkaga harĩ kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩaragio mũno.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kikuyu]: Magana-inĩ ma mĩaka ĩrĩa mĩhĩtũku, andũ manaaka mĩkaro na ũmenyereri kũrĩa kũrĩ na mathukuthuku, kũrĩa kũinamu o nginya igũrũ wa ihurũrũka iria ing’etheire iria.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kikuyu]: Mũigana wa mairũ 800 cia mĨberethi ya Trans-Alaska Pipeline nĨyahingirwo kũrũmĨrĨra gũitĨka kwa makiri ma barrels cia maguta mũhuro wa Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kikuyu]: Icigo imwe cia Belgium ciakoragwo irĩ icigo cia Luxembourg hĩndi ya tene no igĩtuika cia Belgium thuutha wa Belgian Revolution.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kikuyu]: Kuma yambĩrĩrio, The Onion nĩ ĩtuĩkĩte athamaki ama a mohoro ma kinyũrũri ma gukenia andũ, na ĩngĩ ya gũcabithio, na rũrenda  rũngĩ rũgucĩrĩirie aceri million ithano mweri wa ikũmi, na imenyithia cia biacara, na mohoro mũthenya wothe, na nĩ merĩgĩte kũrutithia  ibuku rĩa monereria rĩtago Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Kikuyu]: O na kũrĩ o ũguo, Andũ a Belgium na Swiss arĩa maaragia Kĩ-Faranja no makorwo maathomeire cukuru kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩhũthĩkaga mũno, na kwoguo no mahote gũgũtaũkwo o na korwo wahũthĩra mũtarĩre wa namba ũrĩa ũhũthĩkaga harĩ kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩaragio mũno.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kikuyu]: Magana-inĩ ma mĩaka ĩrĩa mĩhĩtũku, andũ manaaka mĩkaro na ũmenyereri kũrĩa kũrĩ na mathukuthuku, kũrĩa kũinamu o nginya igũrũ wa ihurũrũka iria ing’etheire iria.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kikuyu]: Mũigana wa mairũ 800 cia mĨberethi ya Trans-Alaska Pipeline nĨyahingirwo kũrũmĨrĨra gũitĨka kwa makiri ma barrels cia maguta mũhuro wa Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kikuyu]: Icigo imwe cia Belgium ciakoragwo irĩ icigo cia Luxembourg hĩndi ya tene no igĩtuika cia Belgium thuutha wa Belgian Revolution.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kikuyu]: Kuma yambĩrĩrio, The Onion nĩ ĩtuĩkĩte athamaki ama a mohoro ma kinyũrũri ma gukenia andũ, na ĩngĩ ya gũcabithio, na rũrenda  rũngĩ rũgucĩrĩirie aceri million ithano mweri wa ikũmi, na imenyithia cia biacara, na mohoro mũthenya wothe, na nĩ merĩgĩte kũrutithia  ibuku rĩa monereria rĩtago Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

hyp_text: In the early days of the colonial era, the leader of the Mau Mau rebellion, Field Marshal Muthoni Muhumuza Lealofi III, was captured by the British authorities.

[Kikuyu]: O na kũrĩ o ũguo, Andũ a Belgium na Swiss arĩa maaragia Kĩ-Faranja no makorwo maathomeire cukuru kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩhũthĩkaga mũno, na kwoguo no mahote gũgũtaũkwo o na korwo wahũthĩra mũtarĩre wa namba ũrĩa ũhũthĩkaga harĩ kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩaragio mũno.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kikuyu]: Magana-inĩ ma mĩaka ĩrĩa mĩhĩtũku, andũ manaaka mĩkaro na ũmenyereri kũrĩa kũrĩ na mathukuthuku, kũrĩa kũinamu o nginya igũrũ wa ihurũrũka iria ing’etheire iria.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kikuyu]: Mũigana wa mairũ 800 cia mĨberethi ya Trans-Alaska Pipeline nĨyahingirwo kũrũmĨrĨra gũitĨka kwa makiri ma barrels cia maguta mũhuro wa Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kikuyu]: Icigo imwe cia Belgium ciakoragwo irĩ icigo cia Luxembourg hĩndi ya tene no igĩtuika cia Belgium thuutha wa Belgian Revolution.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kikuyu]: Kuma yambĩrĩrio, The Onion nĩ ĩtuĩkĩte athamaki ama a mohoro ma kinyũrũri ma gukenia andũ, na ĩngĩ ya gũcabithio, na rũrenda  rũngĩ rũgucĩrĩirie aceri million ithano mweri wa ikũmi, na imenyithia cia biacara, na mohoro mũthenya wothe, na nĩ merĩgĩte kũrutithia  ibuku rĩa monereria rĩtago Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Kikuyu]: O na kũrĩ o ũguo, Andũ a Belgium na Swiss arĩa maaragia Kĩ-Faranja no makorwo maathomeire cukuru kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩhũthĩkaga mũno, na kwoguo no mahote gũgũtaũkwo o na korwo wahũthĩra mũtarĩre wa namba ũrĩa ũhũthĩkaga harĩ kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩaragio mũno.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kikuyu]: Magana-inĩ ma mĩaka ĩrĩa mĩhĩtũku, andũ manaaka mĩkaro na ũmenyereri kũrĩa kũrĩ na mathukuthuku, kũrĩa kũinamu o nginya igũrũ wa ihurũrũka iria ing’etheire iria.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kikuyu]: Mũigana wa mairũ 800 cia mĨberethi ya Trans-Alaska Pipeline nĨyahingirwo kũrũmĨrĨra gũitĨka kwa makiri ma barrels cia maguta mũhuro wa Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kikuyu]: Icigo imwe cia Belgium ciakoragwo irĩ icigo cia Luxembourg hĩndi ya tene no igĩtuika cia Belgium thuutha wa Belgian Revolution.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kikuyu]: Kuma yambĩrĩrio, The Onion nĩ ĩtuĩkĩte athamaki ama a mohoro ma kinyũrũri ma gukenia andũ, na ĩngĩ ya gũcabithio, na rũrenda  rũngĩ rũgucĩrĩirie aceri million ithano mweri wa ikũmi, na imenyithia cia biacara, na mohoro mũthenya wothe, na nĩ merĩgĩte kũrutithia  ibuku rĩa monereria rĩtago Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Kikuyu]: O na kũrĩ o ũguo, Andũ a Belgium na Swiss arĩa maaragia Kĩ-Faranja no makorwo maathomeire cukuru kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩhũthĩkaga mũno, na kwoguo no mahote gũgũtaũkwo o na korwo wahũthĩra mũtarĩre wa namba ũrĩa ũhũthĩkaga harĩ kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩaragio mũno.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kikuyu]: Magana-inĩ ma mĩaka ĩrĩa mĩhĩtũku, andũ manaaka mĩkaro na ũmenyereri kũrĩa kũrĩ na mathukuthuku, kũrĩa kũinamu o nginya igũrũ wa ihurũrũka iria ing’etheire iria.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kikuyu]: Mũigana wa mairũ 800 cia mĨberethi ya Trans-Alaska Pipeline nĨyahingirwo kũrũmĨrĨra gũitĨka kwa makiri ma barrels cia maguta mũhuro wa Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kikuyu]: Icigo imwe cia Belgium ciakoragwo irĩ icigo cia Luxembourg hĩndi ya tene no igĩtuika cia Belgium thuutha wa Belgian Revolution.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kikuyu]: Kuma yambĩrĩrio, The Onion nĩ ĩtuĩkĩte athamaki ama a mohoro ma kinyũrũri ma gukenia andũ, na ĩngĩ ya gũcabithio, na rũrenda  rũngĩ rũgucĩrĩirie aceri million ithano mweri wa ikũmi, na imenyithia cia biacara, na mohoro mũthenya wothe, na nĩ merĩgĩte kũrutithia  ibuku rĩa monereria rĩtago Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Kikuyu]: O na kũrĩ o ũguo, Andũ a Belgium na Swiss arĩa maaragia Kĩ-Faranja no makorwo maathomeire cukuru kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩhũthĩkaga mũno, na kwoguo no mahote gũgũtaũkwo o na korwo wahũthĩra mũtarĩre wa namba ũrĩa ũhũthĩkaga harĩ kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩaragio mũno.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kikuyu]: Magana-inĩ ma mĩaka ĩrĩa mĩhĩtũku, andũ manaaka mĩkaro na ũmenyereri kũrĩa kũrĩ na mathukuthuku, kũrĩa kũinamu o nginya igũrũ wa ihurũrũka iria ing’etheire iria.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kikuyu]: Mũigana wa mairũ 800 cia mĨberethi ya Trans-Alaska Pipeline nĨyahingirwo kũrũmĨrĨra gũitĨka kwa makiri ma barrels cia maguta mũhuro wa Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kikuyu]: Icigo imwe cia Belgium ciakoragwo irĩ icigo cia Luxembourg hĩndi ya tene no igĩtuika cia Belgium thuutha wa Belgian Revolution.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kikuyu]: Kuma yambĩrĩrio, The Onion nĩ ĩtuĩkĩte athamaki ama a mohoro ma kinyũrũri ma gukenia andũ, na ĩngĩ ya gũcabithio, na rũrenda  rũngĩ rũgucĩrĩirie aceri million ithano mweri wa ikũmi, na imenyithia cia biacara, na mohoro mũthenya wothe, na nĩ merĩgĩte kũrutithia  ibuku rĩa monereria rĩtago Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Kikuyu]: O na kũrĩ o ũguo, Andũ a Belgium na Swiss arĩa maaragia Kĩ-Faranja no makorwo maathomeire cukuru kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩhũthĩkaga mũno, na kwoguo no mahote gũgũtaũkwo o na korwo wahũthĩra mũtarĩre wa namba ũrĩa ũhũthĩkaga harĩ kĩ-Faranja kĩrĩa kĩaragio mũno.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kikuyu]: Magana-inĩ ma mĩaka ĩrĩa mĩhĩtũku, andũ manaaka mĩkaro na ũmenyereri kũrĩa kũrĩ na mathukuthuku, kũrĩa kũinamu o nginya igũrũ wa ihurũrũka iria ing’etheire iria.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kikuyu]: Mũigana wa mairũ 800 cia mĨberethi ya Trans-Alaska Pipeline nĨyahingirwo kũrũmĨrĨra gũitĨka kwa makiri ma barrels cia maguta mũhuro wa Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kikuyu]: Icigo imwe cia Belgium ciakoragwo irĩ icigo cia Luxembourg hĩndi ya tene no igĩtuika cia Belgium thuutha wa Belgian Revolution.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kikuyu]: Kuma yambĩrĩrio, The Onion nĩ ĩtuĩkĩte athamaki ama a mohoro ma kinyũrũri ma gukenia andũ, na ĩngĩ ya gũcabithio, na rũrenda  rũngĩ rũgucĩrĩirie aceri million ithano mweri wa ikũmi, na imenyithia cia biacara, na mohoro mũthenya wothe, na nĩ merĩgĩte kũrutithia  ibuku rĩa monereria rĩtago Our Dumb World.
